name: Lichess Themes: Newspaper 2.0
description:
Made by myself. 3 chessboards included. Choose PURPLE/LEATHER/GREEN board theme to activate the style. Grey last move color. If you want default, please install Lichess newspaper 1.0 or delete .is2d .cg-board {filter: grayscale(1) brightness(1) contrast(1.1);)  in main css code section. 

(—Å) denguitarist.
